Package com.here.sdk.mapviewlite

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CameraObserver
    Interface for objects that want to get updates whenever the map is redrawn after camera parameters change.
    MapScene.LoadSceneCallback
    This method will be called on the main thread when loading a scene has been completed.
    MapViewLite.CaptureScreenshotCallback
    Callback for receiving result of screenshot capture.
    PickMapItemsCallback
    Interface for the callback that will be invoked with the results of the map items picking operation.
    TileServerProvider
    Interface for the tile server URL provider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera provides means of manipulating the way the map is displayed.
    Camera.OrientationUpdate
    Represents camera orientation update as tilt and bearing angles.
    CameraLimits
    Controls constraints on camera parameters.
    CameraUpdate
    Encapsulates raw data for camera parameters.
    CardinalDirections
    Holds constants for cardinal directions expressed as angles in degrees.
    MapCircle
    A visual representation of a MapCircle with attached styling, which can be placed on the MapScene to be drawn.
    MapCircleStyle
    A style that must be applied to a MapCircle to determine its appearance when displayed.
    MapImage
    A representation of an image optimized for rendering on the map.
    MapImageFactory
    Convenience factory class for loading map images from various sources.
    MapMarker
    Use MapMarker instances to indicate a location on the map.
    MapMarkerImageStyle
    A style that can be applied to map images to determine their appearance when displayed.
    MapOverlay<T extends android.view.View>
    A generic class that can be used to display Android views at a fixed location on the map.
    MapPolygon
    A visual representation of a MapPolygon with attached styling, which can be placed on the MapScene to be drawn.
    MapPolygonStyle
    A style that must be applied to a MapPolygon to determine its appearance when displayed.
    MapPolyline
    A visual representation of a MapPolyline with attached styling, which can be placed on the MapScene to be drawn.
    MapPolylineStyle
    A style that must be applied to a MapPolyline to determine its appearance when displayed.
    MapScene
    Represents a map scene and exposes the functionality to manipulate its content.
    MapSceneConfig
    A bundle that contains scene properties.
    MapViewLite
    A view that can display a map.
    Padding
    Encapsulates the padding on each side of the view object in pixels.
    PickMapItemsResult
    Carries the results from the picking of map items on the map.
    RasterLayer
    A custom raster layer that will be drawn on top of the map.
    SimpleTileServerProvider
    Provides a URL generated from the specified format.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CameraLimits.ErrorCode  
    LayerState
    States to which a map layer can be set.
    MapLayer
    Identifies individual layers of the map that can be enabled or disabled.
    MapScene.ErrorCode
    Represents various errors that could occur as a result of operations on the MapScene.
    MapStyle
    Represents preconfigured map styles bundled with the SDK.
    PixelFormat  
    WatermarkPlacement
    Defines allowed display locations for HERE logo watermark in the preferred order.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CameraLimits.CameraLimitsException  
    MapScene.MapSceneException
